techmeme.title: How Ukraine is using AI, code found online, and hobbyist computers to weaponize consumer tech and build low-cost weapons like autonomous drones and machine guns (New York Times)
Generative AI music service Suno launches its iOS app in the US, with plans for a global rollout and an Android app (Lloyd Coombes/Tom's Guide)
Google says its greenhouse gas emissions have surged 48% in the past five years due to the expansion of the data centers that underpin its AI efforts (Financial Times)
For ~10 years, millions of macOS and iOS apps using CocoaPods were vulnerable to a serious flaw in the dependency manager, which was patched in October 2023 (Dan Goodin/Ars Technica)
Figma disables its recently launched generative AI app design tool Make Design, after a user showed it copied Apple's Weather when asked to design a weather app (Emanuel Maiberg/404 Media)
